body: Little is known of Snowâ€™s life and art training; however, her simple compositions, magnificently executed, rival those of better known still-life artists, such as Barton Stone Hayes.  That she was a skilled artist is not in doubt as one can see by this charming painting.
dimensions: Oil on board, 9.5 x 13.5 inches / Signed lower left
